title: Path of Roller Coaster part - b

content.description: A particle moves long the x-axis so that its velocity v at any time t, for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>16</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAC@</annotation> </semantics> </math> is given by v(t) = e2sint - 1. At time t = 0, the particle is at the origin.
content.question: During what intervals of time is the particle moving to the left? Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: During what intervals of time is the particle moving to the left? Give a reason for your answer.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
